item.title: The Sainsbury's shopping trolley is today (Sunday, 21/9/25 about 6pm) now on the grass verge fronting Luca Court, Mays Hill Rd, about 20m South of (downhill from) the junction with Colebrook Rise, Shortlands, 21st September
item.description:
FMS does not allow me to update my own report (copied below) so I am obliged to file this new one. This is that the Sainsbury's shopping trolley was today (Sunday, 21/9/25 about 6pm) now on the grass verge fronting Luca Court, Mays Hill Rd, about 20m South of (downhill from) the junction with Colebrook Rise. <Previous report from Friday 19/9/25 > Sainsbury's shopping trolley dumped on the lawn fronting 1, Beech Tree Court, Shortlands Rd, Shortlands near the bus shelter and about 25m S of the jct with Valley Rd. Shortlands Road, Bromley Park, Shortlands, Bromley, BR2 0HW, 19:53, 19 Sep 2025
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): May's Hill Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Steet light unbearable. People hit the lamp post quite a lot as it’s directly opposite my drive and it is a matter of time if someone knocks this over and fall into my parked cars as well. We did report this many times. No one did anything g., 21st September
item.description:
Street light unbearable. I suffer from anxiety I can’t have blinds when sleeping. I have had 3 tears in my retina. I cannot look at light. Causing me headaches. Light shining straight into my face when in bed as my bedroom is where bay window is. The lamp post always gets knocked as well as it’s in awkward position and it is matter of time if it get knocked over and fall on one of us or our cars. In this side of close. There are young children, my neighbour at 5 has same issue as light shines in directly to his room. Can someone attend to this please. ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mayplace Close, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Furniture flytipped in road, 21st September
item.description:
Someone has dumped lots of furniture, including two mattresses, a desk chair, some shelves and big mirrors, at the edge of the road in Worcester Close, between Bodleian House and Carfax House. They have been there for over a week. The furniture keeps being moved about - though it was originally at the side of the road, sometimes it is in the road and poses a hazard to traffic.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Worcester Close, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet
